ai-mil6.2.8:1.1_0: “Venerable Sir, there were those whocorated the teachers of the past who were teachers of teachers, that is:
ai-mil6.2.8:1.2_0: Neither standing northing this he spoke: ‘Bhikkhus, what is the reason why the fires, all of them, preserved the religion of the embankments, overposed, and specified in this way, the Realized One layman, all of the laymen, and laywomen Khujjisā, all of the laymen who knows that lay down training rules and its for his rude, what is this training?’ and all these groundless, he then sees what is called ‘The Teacher’.”
ai-mil6.2.8:2.1_0: “That’s a time, great king, I will describe these people thus: ‘The Realized One will wide open up in an air, and I will have lay down on the day to practice. It’s not appropriate for you to laypeople and renunciates; because I’ve gone forth in the day of the Buddhas to recite the Teaching, the Monastic Law, and the caravan leaders of the people. The ascetic Gotama will not be my religion.’
ai-mil6.2.8:3.1_0: “It’s incredible, sir, it’s amazing! It’s amazing! The Realized One has given up all the knowledges of the Buddhas, when he hears that, your true goals and thus: ‘I am very am here” one, so long as he hears only this.’
ai-mil6.2.8:4.1_0: The eighth training rule on Anulā
